extendedInfo.description: A weather report update of particular place is very important to be reckoning with. As the global warming has changed and is changing the climatic pattern of the world and in some parts with vast amount. Sometimes the cyclones and flood announcements that pour in the as the flashing news of the hour in the live weather report are something that everyone should be connected with. If you want to the live weather report updates in your city, and be updated with the climatic turbulence that occur in your place then click to download the latest android app onâ live weather reportâ DISCLAIMER: The content provided in this app is collected using Feeds and Videos are hosted by YouTube and all are available in public domain. We have not uploaded any videos to YouTube. Apps are fetching the data from RSS feeds of different sites.This app provides an organized way to browse, read contents and watch YouTube Videos.

reviews.title: Weather info rich
reviews.comment: Nice infos on weather forecast. The article abt a weather forecast anchor hiccup-ing all the way is funny, haha
reviews.author: Margaretha Susanti
